en.hero_subtitle: Front-End, Back-End, Automation, and Focus on Scalable Solutions.
en.about_paragraph_1: I am a Junior Web Developer with a creative, curious profile, and a passion for technology. My experience includes front-end and back-end development, responsive websites, and process automation systems.
en.about_paragraph_2: I seek opportunities to work in innovative teams, contributing efficient, scalable, and secure solutions, growing professionally in agile and collaborative environments.
